title: Patient-Reported Outcome Measures in Individuals With Hereditary or Sporadic Kidney Cancer

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: Patient-reported outcomes (PROs) in kidney cancer can predict survival and treatment response, with **70%** accuracy in clinical trials.
**TACTICAL WIN**: [SHIP NOW] Integrate real-time PRO dashboards for immediate patient feedback on symptom management.
